channel.title: Sades SA-708
channel.description:
I recently bought the headset Sades SA-708.
For some reason, the speakers are working, but the microphone is not.
I've gone to sound management (or w/e it's called) and it says Microphone, under Microphone it says unavailable.
I've googled it, but nothing comes up. Does anyone know how to solve this issue?
[img]http://i.ebayimg.com/00/s/NjI4WDYyOA==/z/ytsAAOxy5QtR8OfT/$T2eC16RHJGYE9nooh7LsBR8OfTL3(Q~~60_35.JPG[/img]
